resource.name: My CareNet Claim BE profile
resource.description: Claim profile for use in the different eAgreement flow from MyCareNet.

resource.name: My CareNet Claim Response BE profile
resource.description: Claimresponse profile for use in the different eAgreement flows from MyCareNet.

resource.name: My CareNet eAgreement Demand Bundle BE profile
resource.description: The profile for the demand for an agreement.

resource.name: My CareNet eAgreement MessageHeader BE profile
resource.description: This is the generic MessageHeader profile for use in the different eAgreement flows from MyCareNet.

resource.name: My CareNet eAgreement Consult Reply Bundle BE profile
resource.description: Profile for the reply to consulting eAgreement request in the MyCareNet flows.

resource.name: My CareNet eAgreement Demand Reply Bundle BE profile
resource.description: The profile for the reply on a demand for an agreement in the MyCareNet flows.

resource.name: My CareNet eAgreement Consult Bundle BE profile
resource.description: Profile for the consulting of eAgreement in the MyCareNet flows.

resource.name: My CareNet operation outcome BE profile
resource.description: OperationOutcome profile for the specific error codes of MyCareNet.

resource.name: My CareNet pathology registration bundle BE profile
resource.description: Profile for the registration of a pathology in the MyCareNet flows.

resource.name: My CareNet pathology registration reply bundle BE profile
resource.description: Profile for the registrationreply of a pathology in the MyCareNet flows.

resource.name: ReportedNumberOfSessions
resource.description: To define e.g. when a physiotherapy procedure took 10 sessions. Only used in administrative flows.

resource.name: ValueSet productor service
resource.description: NIHDI codes for use to describe eAgreement products or services in the MyCareNet eAgreement flows.

resource.name: CodeSystem agreement errors
resource.description:
Errors in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

resource.name: CodeSystem agreement types
resource.description: Agreement types for MyCareNet flows. Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

resource.name: CodeSystem decision values
resource.description:
Decision values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) The codes are not defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

resource.name: CodeSystem diagnostic report types
resource.description: DiagnosticReport types for MyCareNet flows.No are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

resource.name: CodeSystem message events
resource.description: Message events for MyCareNet flows.Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

resource.name: CodeSystem refusal values
resource.description:
Refusal values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) The codes are not defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

resource.name: CodeSystem waiting for information values
resource.description:
Waiting for information values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) The codes are not defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

resource.name: CodeSystem NIHDILegalPhysiotherapyFa
resource.description:
Legal pathology codes as defined by NIHDI to be used in the pathology registration flows of MyCareNet. These values are managed by NIHDI. 
	The codes are not defined here. Consult the cookbooks on mycarenet.be for concrete usage intstrcutions.

resource.name: CodeSystem NIHDIPhysiotherapyPathology
resource.description: Legal pathology situation codes as defined by NIHDI to be used in the pathology registration flows of MyCareNet. These values are managed by NIHDI. The codes are not defined here. Consult the cookbooks on mycarenet.be for concrete usage instructions.
